attributes.title: Panel discussion: all about open source

blurb.html:
We all use open source software in our personal, business or work related projects. Ever wondered who the people behind developing & maintaining these open source libraries are? Join us on for a panel discussion to know more about the intricacies of open source development & learn from the masters themselves. Hear them share their career journeys, their motivations behind contributing to OS and how they manage teams on various OS projects. Our panelists:

  • Juergen Hoeller – Co-founder & Project lead for Spring Framework
  • Emmanuel Bernard – Chief Architect Red Hat, Java champion and open source contributor on Hibernate ORM
  • David Pilato – Developer and Evangelist at Elastic
  • Kohsuke Kawaguchi – Creator of Jenkins & CTO CloudBees

This panel will be moderated by Purnima Kamath – Director at Women Who Code SG & Evangelist at YOW!
